US4693702: What is claimed is: 1. A method of treating inflammation comprising administering an effective amount of a salicylic acid derivative to a patient in need thereof.
US5821323: What is claimed is: 1. A pharmaceutical composition comprising a substituted benzamide together with a pharmaceutically acceptable carrier.
US4007047: What is claimed is: 1. An analgesic composition comprising acetylsalicylic acid and a physiologically acceptable diluent.
